bibl.title: Letter fragment from Henry Rose Carter to Laura Armistead Carter, [19--]

div1.head: Letter fragment from Henry Rose Carter to Laura Armistead Carter, [19--]
div1.opener:
OFFICE OF
MEDICAL OFFICER IN CHARGE.
TREASURY DEPARTMENT
UNITED STATES
PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE
BALTIMORE, MD.

list.head:
Mem
to
Miss Laura A. Carter
list.item:
(1) If you can find my little bi-
ble please send it to me

(2) Did you get my Parcels Post
package from Talladega springs.

(3) I have a man in my employ
who says you nos

item.p:
(4) A “Flapper” is a young Wild Goose
not big enough to fly- & which
therefore goes flapping over
the water. They are considered
extremely good eating on the
Coosa.

Coosa - as they are tender - while
the average flying Wild Goose
is tough

div1.p:
I got rid of red bugs & got none
none yesterday- Today was fairly
cool hence little perspiration
hence a new crop - confound
them, I really do not mind
them as much as I did. There is
some immunity
